text: The Girl with a Hatbox () is a 1928 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Boris Barnet.Организаторы заявили, что онлайн-режим вывел лондонскую "Масленицу" на международную сценуVR-спектакль и киномузыка: подборка культурных событий на неделю It stars Anna Sten, Vladimir Mikhailov, and Vladimir Fogel. ==Actors== *Anna Sten as Natasha *Vladimir Mikhailov as her grandfather *Vladimir Fogel as Fogelev *Ivan Koval-Samborsky as Ilya Snegiryov *Serafima Birman as Madame Irène == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1928 comedy movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet
title: The Girl with a Hatbox
